message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal for a high-quality item. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good price. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm trying to stay within my budget
